subject: feat(import): add title-based fallback and field aliases for JSON connections
body:
JSON import now resolves arc endpoints by title when sourceId/targetId
don't match any node ID. AI models frequently put titles in ID fields
because the ID indirection is unintuitive for generated output.

Also accepts `source`/`target` as aliases for `sourceId`/`targetId`,
matching the same defensive pattern as the Markdown `to:`/`target:` fix.

Guide updated: JSON tips now mention title-as-ID option and Unicode note.

Tags: import, json, connections, ai-output
Complexity: 2
Urgency: 3
Impact: user-facing
Risk: low
Debt: paid
Epic: ai-research-output
Semver: minor

title: add title-based fallback and field aliases for JSON connections
